runSelectedCellsAndGotoNext.text: Run selected cells and go to next cell

runSelectedCellsAndInsertBelow.text: Run selected cells and insert below

sessionNotConnected.text: Current document not connected to a session

reset.description: Reset all settings options to default (will refresh the page)
reset.title: Reset settings options

executeGoto.description: Whether to automatically go to the currently executing code block during execution
executeGoto.title: Go to code block during execution

inputGoto.description: Whether to automatically go to the currently executing code block when requesting user input
inputGoto.title: Go to code block when input

stopOnError.description: Whether to abort execution when an uncaught exception is encountered
stopOnError.title: Stop on error

enable.description: Enable to attempt to establish connection with Jupyter service
enable.title: Enable Jupyter client

delay.description:
The delay time when calling the Jupyter kernel language service to get context help and code suggestions.
Unit: milliseconds
delay.title: Language service call delay

cntrl.description:
Whether to parse rich text styles using control characters \e
Only effective when displaying content using the SiYuan paragraph block and is applied only to the text output of code cells in imported files
When enabled, it will render rich text styles in the output text
When disabled, it will remove rich text styles from the output text
cntrl.title: Parse control characters

escaped.description:
Whether to escape Markdown symbols
Only effective when displaying content using the SiYuan paragraph block and is applied only to the text output of code cells in imported files
When enabled, it will display the raw text content of the output text (escaping all Markdown symbols)
When disabled, it will consider the content of the output text as Markdown text for rendering
escaped.title: Escape symbols

xterm.description:
Whether to use xterm.js to render the content of code cell outputs in imported files
When enabled, it will ignore the settings of Escape symbols and Parse control characters
When disabled, it will use the SiYuan paragraph block to display the content of cell outputs in imported files
xterm.title: Render output content with Xterm

cntrl.description:
Whether to parse rich text styles set using control characters \e
Only effective when displaying output content using the SiYuan paragraph block
When enabled, it will render rich text styles in the output content
When disabled, it will remove rich text styles from the output content
cntrl.title: Parse control characters

escaped.description:
Whether to escape Markdown symbols
Only effective when displaying output content using the SiYuan paragraph block
When enabled, it will display the raw text content of the output text (escaping all Markdown symbols)
When disabled, it will consider the content of the output text as Markdown text for rendering
escaped.title: Escape symbols

xterm.description:
Whether to use xterm.js to render the content of program runtime outputs
When enabled, it will ignore the settings of Escape symbols and Parse control characters
When disabled, it will use the SiYuan paragraph block to display the output content
xterm.title: Render output content with Xterm

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the Jupyter service
baseUrl.title: Jupyter service URL

wsUrl.description: WebSocket URL for Jupyter kernel interaction
wsUrl.title: Kernel WebSocket URL

connect.description: Create a new session or select a current active session
connect.title: Session Selection

kernel.description:
Select the kernel to use for the session, you can use No Kernel, New Kernel, or Running Kernel
⏹ Disable Kernel: Do not use a kernel
▶ Start Kernel [Language Name] Kernel Name: Kernel Description: Create a new kernel
♻ Reuse Kernel [Language Name] Kernel Name: Session Name: Use the kernel from another session
kernel.title: Kernel Selection

path.description: The path to the file in the Jupyter workspace, the corresponding directory is also the working directory of the kernel runtime
path.title: Session Path

type.description:
console: Jupyter console, interactive runtime environment
notebook: Jupyter notebook, *.ipynb file
type.title: Session Type

fontFamily.description: The font to use when displaying output using xterm.js
fontFamily.title: Font Family
